org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader

Class AbstractMonitoringJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader.AbstractMonitoringJob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardAbsentPingMonitoringJob, CardPresentMonitoringJob, SmartInsertionMonitoringJob, SmartRemovalMonitoringJob

    public abstract class AbstractMonitoringJob
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitoring jobs abstract class.

    Observable readers can instantiate AbstractMonitoringJob to perform background processing during the different states of the generic state machine.

    Internal events (AbstractObservableLocalReader.InternalEvent) can be fired to change the state of the machine via the AbstractObservableState class passed as a constructor's argument.

    Standard AbstractMonitoringJob are already defined in the local.monitoring package but it is possible to define new ones within a plugin reader if necessary, implementing this abstract class.
